error.no_lat_lng: You must provide a latitude and longitude.
error.no_nearest_store: We could not find your nearest store.
error.no_provided_type: You must provide an order type to set pickup or delivery
error.no_provided_id: You must provide an order_item_id of the item in your order that you wish to remove.
error.no_provided_voucher: You must provide a voucher code.
error.no_provided_store_id: You must provide a store id.
error.missing_token: You are missing your order token or order_id. Ensure that you have instantiated your order.
error.no_items_to_remove: You do not have any items left to remove.
error.log_in_required: You must log in as a user before you can set your address

success.init_order: Your order has been successfully instantiated. You may now add items.
success.added_item: Successfully added item to your order.
success.removed_item: Successfully removed item from your order.
